description:
The KMS ciphertext resource allows you to encrypt plaintext into ciphertext
by using an AWS KMS customer master key. The value returned by this resource
is stable across every apply. For a changing ciphertext value each apply, see
the [`aws_kms_ciphertext` data source](/docs/providers/aws/d/kms_ciphertext.html).

~> **Note:** All arguments including the plaintext be stored in the raw state as plain-text.
[Read more about sensitive data in state](/docs/state/sensitive-data.html).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Context.description: An optional mapping that makes up the encryption context.

KeyId.description: Globally unique key ID for the customer master key.

Plaintext.description: Data to be encrypted. Note that this may show up in logs, and it will be stored in the state file.
